original_title: 大決戦セイバルコンギャラクシー
overview: The Earth Defense Force “SWORD” carry out an counterattack operation against a mysterious huge creature appeared in Shinjuku. But that was the illusion created by Ultimate Seijin who planned to invade the earth. SWORD was caught off guard and on the verge of annihilation,In that instant, the brilliant flash of light enveloped them! A new hero flies down in front of SWORD, who continues to fight day and night to protect peace on earth! It's called Saberlcon Galaxy. The story of the most free-spirited hero in Saberlcon history begins!
title: Saberlcon Galaxy
